title: Xprim777
author: Xprim777
content: Hi, I would like to sell these Coldkey prototypes : Â Lot #1 : Â Coldkey prototype - Unfundedhttps://www.blockchain.com/btc/address/127AynXjLdzDjYzFbcUw43nNULLBNc1TDB One of the first functional Coldkey cards. It has the protective lamination layer and a generic hologram. The card is in good condition but has some minor scratches.I don't know how many were made. https://imgur.com/a/73jIdzzStarting bid : 0.001 BTCLot #2 : Holographic Coldkey prototypeThis is the same prototype than this one : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5337722 but with an holographic layer. It doesn't have the protective lamination, and the other side is blank. It's in good condition but has some minor scratches. 2 were madeI took a video to show the hologram better than on the pics: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/77szIPzpxx0https://imgur.com/a/KHBjrHEStarting Bid : 0.001 BTCMinimum bid increments on each lot : 0.0001 BTC End time : Sunday 27th November 2022, 23h UTC+1 (Paris time) - Countdown TimerSniping : Bids within 10 minutes before the auction end extend the auction for 10 minutes.Payment : 36Bt3j2czo7kQtS4wkASaFREQ9EqQ96uLiShipping : $10 worldwide with trackingEscrow accepted, winner pays fees.
